Text:
LOL "it is immoral to not give the money you have earned to the government"

i lold hard.

For one thing, the government has no moral sense, so why should we treat it with ours?

Also, fuck the government. Our hard earned money is practically stolen, so we should take back what we can.

I can't wait to read this.
I was being very sarcastic, The3W4lru5. lol
